T02D3494:148b-1: ma h'a ts'i na kra ma t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3494:148b-3: rgya nag chen po'i rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3494:148b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3494:148b-5: g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis ro yi snying gar mnan cing mi bzad mchog gi gad rgyangs dgod //
T02D3494:148b-6: ral gri autpal gri gug thod pa phyag bsnams h'um yig sa bon las byung ma //
T02D3494:148b-7: thung zhing sngo la sbom pa ral pa'i thor tshugs ser po mchog gi klu dang ldan //
T02D3494:148b-8: 'gro ba rnams kyi mi shes thod pa la bkod 'joms shing drag po'i sgrol ma nyid //
T02D3494:148b-9: sgrol ma srid pa gsum sgrol ma //
T02D3494:148b-10: rgya nag rim 'ongs la btud de //
T02D3494:148b-11: bla ma'i man ngag ji lta bar //
T02D3494:148b-12: de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod //
T02D3494:148b-13: ling+ga gcig dang dur khrod dang //
T02D3494:148b-14: yang na khyim ni stong pa ru //
T02D3494:148b-15: thams cad du ni der gnas nas //
T02D3494:148b-16: srid pa gsum las sgrol ba yi //
T02D3494:148b-17: rig pa rnal 'byor ba yis bsgrub //
T02D3494:149a-2: gzhan yang 'jam por gyur pa yi //
T02D3494:149a-3: shing stan la sogs mnyam gnas la //
T02D3494:149a-4: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D3494:149a-5: skad cig rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3494:149a-6: rdo rje gsum las legs mnyam gzhag / gnas gsum du ni de bsam bya //
T02D3494:149a-8: srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D3494:149a-9: gsal bar mdzad nas slar yang ni //
T02D3494:149a-10: bsdus nas khams gsum mtha' dag kyang //
T02D3494:149a-11: stong pa nyid du bsam par bya //
T02D3494:149a-12: de nas rgyal ba'i gsang sngags brjod //
T02D3494:149a-13: aom sh'u n+ya t'a sogs rang bzhin no //
T02D3494:149a-14: de nas nam mkha' a'a:yig las ;
T02D3494:149a-15: / chu skyes dmar po bsam par bya //
T02D3494:149a-16: slar yang de steng bsam bya ba //
T02D3494:149a-17: t'am yig las ni padma'i snod //
T02D3494:149a-18: slar yang de dbus bsam par bya //
T02D3494:149a-19: h'um yig mthon mthing dang mtshungs pa //
T02D3494:149a-20: de las h'um yig las skyes pa'i //
T02D3494:149a-21: gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan blta //
T02D3494:149a-22: gri gug yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D3494:149a-23: bdag nyid sgrol ma dang mtshungs bsgom //
T02D3494:149a-24: zhabs ni g-yon brkyang mi bzad ma //
T02D3494:149a-25: mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang //
T02D3494:149a-27: chu skyes sngon pos rnam par brgyan //
T02D3494:149a-28: bzang mo zhal gcig spyan gsum ma //
T02D3494:149a-29: mi bzad gad rgyangs 'od dang ldan //
T02D3494:149a-30: rab tu dgyes shing ro la zhon ;
T02D3494:149a-31: / klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D3494:149a-32: spyan ni dmar zhing zlum pa ste //
T02D3494:149a-33: stag gi pags pa rked la mnabs //
T02D3494:149a-34: lang tsho gzhon zhing phun sum tshogs //
T02D3494:149a-35: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3494:149a-36: ljags ni bsgril zhing mche ba gtsigs //
T02D3494:149a-38: phyag g-yas ral gri gri gug ste //
T02D3494:149a-39: g-yon na autpal thod pa bsnams //
T02D3494:149a-40: dmar ser ral gcig gyen du brdzes //
T02D3494:149a-41: mi bskyod dbu brgyan bsam par bya //
T02D3494:149a-42: bsgoms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa yis //
T02D3494:149a-44: gal te blun zhing rmongs gyur kyang //
T02D3494:149a-45: bsgom pa'i ro la brtson phyed na //
T02D3494:149a-47: 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas par bya //
T02D3494:149a-48: ye ge gsum gyi sngags chen po //
T02D3494:149a-49: phat yig mtha' ru snying gar dgod //
T02D3494:149a-50: 'od zer lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D3494:149a-51: ma shes bud shing bsreg pa po //
T02D3494:149b-0: de yis btu ba'i cho ga @149b brjod ;
T02D3494:149b-1: / dang po sa yi pha rol phyin //
T02D3494:149b-2: dbyangs yig bzhi pas rnam par brgyan //
T02D3494:149b-4: zla ba thig le yang dag ldan //
T02D3494:149b-5: de ni yig la yang sbyin //
T02D3494:149b-6: de bzhin bzhi pas rnam par brgyan //
T02D3494:149b-7: slar yang ha yig la sbyor te //
T02D3494:149b-8: au yig ring po yang dag ldan //
T02D3494:149b-9: phat kyi yi ge'ang de nas sbyin //
T02D3494:149b-10: yongs rdzogs grub pa'i sngags nyid do //
T02D3494:149b-11: mkhas pas ral gri'i gnas su ni //
T02D3494:149b-12: mi yi rus pa'i phreng ba bsam//
T02D3494:149b-13: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3494:149b-14: sngags mchog yang dag bzlas par bya //
T02D3494:149b-15: brtan pa'i sems kyis brtag byas na //
T02D3494:149b-16: bdag nyid mkhas shing snyan ngag che //
T02D3494:149b-17: rtag tu bsgom pa goms pa yis //
T02D3494:149b-18: de nyid the tshom med par 'gyur //
T02D3494:149b-19: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs brtsams pa las //
T02D3494:149b-20: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02D3494:149b-21: de yis srog chags thams cad ni //
T02D3494:149b-22: rgyal ba'i bstan la mkhas par shog / de 'dir rtag pa'i rdo rje yis //
T02D3494:149b-23: blo 'phel sgrub thabs byas pa yis ;
T02D3494:149b-24: / zab mo la ni mkhas pa rnams //
T02D3494:149b-25: 'di la bzod pa mdzad par rigs //
T02D3494:149b-26: rgya nag chen po'i rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs
